item.title: [COLOR gold]*Documentales sobre el Universo[/COLOR] Con URL LIVE RESOLVER

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[makelist.param1]</title> import urlresolver url = 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=[makelist.param2]&list=PLmV3HGaGxSDyiKB7kbK8oubA7LOIngD1Z' try: u = urlresolver.resolve(url) except: u = 'http://www.grupo-netai.org/error.mp4' return u <thumbnail>https://i.ytimg.com/vi/[makelist.param1]/hqdefault.jpg</thumbnail> <fanart>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Andorth/Hercules/master/imagenes/fanart.jpg</fanart>

item.title: [COLOR gold]*Documentales sobre el Universo[/COLOR] Con Addon youtube
